### ğŸ”„ Nodeâ€‘byâ€‘Node Breakdown

### âš™ï¸ Preâ€‘conditions / Requirements

1. Import this workflow into your n8n instance.
2. Configure the New Leads Arrived node to watch your CSV folder.

### ğŸ” Security and Privacy
